Moose::Meta::Role::Application::RoleSummation(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation Moose::Meta::Role::Application::RoleSummation(3)

NAME

Moose::Meta::Role::Application::RoleSummation - Combine two or more roles

VERSION

version 2.2012

DESCRIPTION

Summation composes two traits, forming the union of non-conflicting bindings and 'disabling' the conflicting bindings

METHODS

new
meta
role_params
get_exclusions_for_role
get_method_aliases_for_role
is_aliased_method
is_method_aliased
is_method_excluded
apply
check_role_exclusions
check_required_methods
check_required_attributes
apply_attributes
apply_methods
apply_overloading
apply_method_modifiers
apply_override_method_modifiers
